query:
INSERT INTO blogPosts (title, slug, excerpt, content, category, tags, authorId, authorName, authorCredentials, readTime, viewCount, isPublished, publishedAt, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES ('Implementing PSQA Workflows: Best Practices for Modern Radiation Oncology', 'implementing-psqa-workflows-best-practices', 'A comprehensive framework for establishing efficient and effective patient-specific quality assurance programs that balance safety with clinical throughput.', '# Implementing PSQA Workflows

Patient-specific QA represents a critical component of modern radiation oncology. This article presents a comprehensive framework for implementing efficient PSQA workflows.

## TG-218 Recommendations

- Universal PSQA for all IMRT/VMAT plans
- Gamma passing rates ≥90% for 3%/2mm
- Systematic failure investigation
- Continuous quality improvement

## Conclusion

Modern PSQA programs balance safety, efficiency, and resource utilization through evidence-based best practices.', 'quality-assurance', 'PSQA, quality assurance, IMRT, VMAT, TG-218', 1, 'Dr. Michael Rodriguez', 'PhD, DABR', 10, 0, 1, '2025-01-10', NOW(), NOW())
command:
